# Clone CMAQ repository {.unnumbered}

- The [Community Multiscale Air Quality (CMAQ) model](https://github.com/USEPA/CMAQ.git) is a suite of programs for simulating air quality. This model forms the basis of AIRPACT6. The

```
git clone -b 5.3.3 https://github.com/USEPA/CMAQ.git
```

::: {.callout-important}
Note that AIRPACT6 is currently based on CMAQ version 5.3.3 (not 5.4).
:::
